sentences.english: No one can stop the flight of the conceptual architects’ thought.
sentences.chinese: 誰也不能阻遏概念建築師的思想天馬行空。

sentences.english: Media test drive has always been unconstrained woolgather.
sentences.chinese: 媒體試駕向來是天馬行空，獨往獨來。

sentences.english: What was once wild fantasy had become reality.
sentences.chinese: 這個一度天馬行空的幻想已然成爲事實。

sentences.english: This is my unconstrained woolgather, some are true, some are false.
sentences.chinese: 天馬行空的胡思亂想，有真有假。

sentences.english: just being creative enough in my imagination.
sentences.chinese: 我的想象力還不夠天馬行空。
